name: Finance101
0:
”Alexa, open Finance One Oh One”
”Alexa, ask Finance 101 to recommend stocks”
”Alexa, tell Finance 101 to add Amazon to portfolio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: finance one oh one
des:
Get recommended stocks! Or add stocks to your portfolio and track the total value! Alexa can also analyze a single stock! Or, find stocks based on your own criteria! As of now, Alexa can find up to 20 stocks based on:

P/E ratio
P/B ratio
Share price
Return on equity
Earnings per share
Dividend yield
Earnings
Earnings growth
Revenue
Revenue growth
Market capitalization
Dollar volume

DISCLAIMER: data is not real time and is one day delayed.
